name: Soldo
slogan: Soldo is the multi-user expense account for business
description:
Soldo Business is a new milestone in the evolution of business expenses.

We've harnessed the smartest financial and payments technology to build a product that puts an end to tedious expense reports and reconciliation processes, once and for all.

Soldo Business has three key ingredients: Mastercard® cards (plastic and virtual), an intuitive admin dashboard, and an app for employees.

Thanks to innovative features such as tagging and receipt attachment, staff and teams are no longer mere users of company funds, but also (effortlessly) become contributors to the company’s accounting process.

No more expense reports and mislaid receipts: Soldo is easy, efficient and seamless.

Make it easier for your employees and teams to spend the money they need to spend. Control and track your company’s expenses across the organization with Soldo Business.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
There is no better time to move the Soldo development team! We will be doubling our size in the next 5 months which means we have some fantastic opportunities to offer individuals looking for a career move. The heart of our technology team is based in Rome and this is where we are looking to open a new position in our BackEnd Development team.

You will be part of a team (5 to 10) with other developers and report to the Head of Back End Development to play an important part in developing and managing the company FinTech platform.

What are the key parts of the role?

The role requires you to write high quality code to technical and functional specifications. You will be inspecting, analysing, reporting on bugs. Other core responsibilities include:

Participate in the design and development of product features
Capacity to deliver one or more requirements on time
Participating in periodical plans to deliver business and IT goals


Requirements
The ideal candidates have experience working in a collaborative environment following an Agile Methodology and have a genuine interest and passion for the technologies they use. They will also be joining an agile, international and innovative technical team who continuously keep the platforms up to date with the state-of-art technology and build industry leading systems across the cloud.


We have a full job description available, but to give you an idea of what makes a successful Back End Developer at Soldo we have noted down some key skills:


Great experience of Java, Spring Frameworks
Solid experience of web programming such as HTTP and REST
Relational database experience - especially MySQL and Aurora
Great communication skills and the drive to help others in the team
A good human being!


If this sounds like you, please get in touch with us by applying for this role. We will be delighted to hear from you.


As an international organisation, we use English as our business language, so we'd appreciate if you could send your CV written in English.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.description:
There is no better time to move the Soldo development team! We will be doubling our size in the next 5 months which means we have some fantastic opportunities to offer individuals looking for a career move. 

The heart of our technology team is based in Rome and this is where we are looking to open a new position. You will be part of a team (5 to 10) with other developers and report to the Head of Front End Development to play an important part in developing and managing the company FinTech platform.

What are the key parts of the role?

The role requires you to write high quality code to technical and functional specifications. You will be inspecting, analysing, reporting on bugs. Other core responsibilities include:

Consistently monitoring front end performance including loading speed
Implementing solutions to fulfill the defined needs
Participating in periodical plans to deliver business and IT goals
Requirements
The ideal candidates have experience working in a collaborative environment following an Agile Methodology and have a genuine passion for the technologies they use. They will also be joining an agile, international and innovative technical team who continuously keep the platforms up to date with the state-of-art technology and build industry leading systems across the cloud (AWS).

We have a full job description available, but to give you an idea of what makes a successful Front End Developer at Soldo we have noted down some key skills:

Great experience of Javascript, Typescript, HTML5, CSS/CSS3, SASS, Flexboard Grid and Webpack
Solid experience of JS Frameworks such as React and Angular
Front End Testing experience i.e. Jest and Enzyme
Familiarity with Agile methodology
Great communication skills (in both Italian and English) and the drive to help others in the team
A good human being, with entrepreneurial spirit and personal motivation!

If this sounds like you, please get in touch with us by applying for this role. We will be delighted to hear from you.

As an international organisation, we use English as our business language, so we'd appreciate if you could send your CV written in English.
